## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description              | Type                                              | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`    | `color`    |                          | `string`                                          | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Deaktivierung des Button | `boolean`                                         | `undefined` |
| `label`    | `label`    | Inhalt des Button        | `string`                                          | `"Basic"`   |
| `theme`    | `theme`    |                          | `"danger" \| "plain" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `undefined` |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Style des Button         | `"basic" \| "flat" \| "outline" \| "raised"`      | `undefined` |
